name: Space Hurricane Storm
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Space Hurricane Storm - it's a dynamic scrolling shooter, in which you'll have to fight with alien invaders, who try to seize power in the universe on their ships.

You'll take the role of the pilot of the independent ship "LIBERATOR", which opposes the legions of spacecraft.

Check your persistence, and destroy the main ships of the federation, breaking their shields. The truth is on your side, you bring a peace and freedom.

Using different types of weapons, you can make your way through a dangerous space. Dodging from the attack, you need to maintain self-control and control over the situation.

In this war you need to win!

Believe in yourself!

Be strong!

The fate of the galaxy is in your hands!
